description: Temari is Nagihiko`s first Guardian Character. Temari appears to be elegant and Nagihiko`s desire to be more mannered and become a Japanese dancer. However, during Character Change, both Temari and Nagihiko (as Nadeshiko) become aggressive and very masculine; Nagihiko, inadvertantly, also gains a naginata, which he promptly uses.
name: Temari
